com.samsung.android.sdk.healthdata

Class HealthConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.healthdata.HealthConstants

  • public final class HealthConstants
extends Object
    This class contains interfaces for Samsung Digital Health's data types such as counting steps or exercise.

    Samsung Digital Health provides:

    • Predefined data type including user profile
    • Custom data type

    S Health's health data can be accessed after acquiring data permission through HealthPermissionManager.

    Predefined Data Type

    The health data framework has the following useful predefined data types.

    • HealthConstants.StepCount
    • HealthConstants.Exercise
    • HealthConstants.Sleep
    • HealthConstants.SleepStage
    • HealthConstants.FoodInfo
    • HealthConstants.FoodIntake
    • HealthConstants.WaterIntake
    • HealthConstants.CaffeineIntake
    • HealthConstants.Weight
    • HealthConstants.HeartRate
    • HealthConstants.BodyTemperature
    • HealthConstants.BloodPressure
    • HealthConstants.BloodGlucose
    • HealthConstants.OxygenSaturation
    • HealthConstants.HbA1c
    • HealthConstants.Electrocardiogram
    • HealthConstants.AmbientTemperature
    • HealthConstants.UvExposure
    • HealthUserProfile

    HealthConstants.Common is a basic class for all predefined data types except HealthUserProfile. It is extended to:

    • HealthConstants.DiscreteMeasurement
        Data type interfaces which have only the start time of measurement without the end time extend it. It is for general measured data.

    • HealthConstants.SessionMeasurement
        Data type interfaces which have the end time of measurement with the start time extend it.

    • HealthConstants.FoodInfo
        Food information is not related with the start or end time for measurement. It contains information for food intake to figure out earned calories and its nutrition.

    The following class diagram shows the relationship between HealthConstants and its nested interfaces.

    Common Properties for Data Type

    HealthConstants.Common identifies common properties of health data. Its values are assigned by the system when the new health data is inserted.

    • Health data ID
    • Data creation and update time
    • Application package name that provides health data
    • Device information which provides health data

    The predefined data type extends one of the following interfaces according to its characteristics.

    Discrete Measurement

    HealthConstants.DiscreteMeasurement defines basic measurement information.

    • Start time of measurement
    • Time zone

    Session Measurement

    HealthConstants.SessionMeasurement defines measurement information that has a session with the end time.

    • Start time of measurement
    • End time of measurement
    • Time zone

    Custom Data Type

    If there is no proper data type among predefined data types for you application, the custom data type can be a solution.
    You can use the S Health's shared custom data type:

    • Daily step count trend

    The custom health data type's name follows the FQDN (fully qualified domain name) style without name collision. If you check the data type name of HealthConstants.BloodGlucose, you can find its value as below.

      E.g. "com.samsung.health.blood_glucose"

    The custom health data type can be defined with all new properties or with importing the existing predefined data type.
    The following common properties are mandatory for the custom data type.

    • "datauuid" (text): the unique ID of health data. It's assigned by the system when data is inserted.
    • "create_time" (long): the created time of health data. It's assigned by the system when data is inserted.
    • "update_time" (long): the updated time of health data. It's assigned by the system when data is inserted.
    • "pkg_name" (text): the application package name that provides health data. It's assigned by the system when data is inserted.
    • "deviceuuid" (text): device identifier. It needs to set with HealthData.setSourceDevice(String) when data is inserted.

    The defined custom data type works after registering it on the related site.
    Refer to Programming Guide. You can find it in the downloaded SDK's /HealthData/Docs folder.

    Since:
    1.0.0

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  HealthConstants.AmbientTemperature
      This interface defines ambient temperature and humidity data around the device.
      static interface  HealthConstants.BloodGlucose
      This interface defines blood glucose data of user.
      static interface  HealthConstants.BloodPressure
      This interface defines blood pressure data of user.
      static interface  HealthConstants.BodyTemperature
      This interface defines body temperature data of user.
      static interface  HealthConstants.CaffeineIntake
      This interface defines caffeine intake data of user.
      static interface  HealthConstants.Common
      This interface contains the common constants for health data such as the unique ID for data, the application ID which provides data, and the device information.
      static interface  HealthConstants.DiscreteMeasurement
      This interface contains basic constants for measurement such as the start or offset time.
      static interface  HealthConstants.Electrocardiogram
      This interface defines electrocardiogram data of user.
      static interface  HealthConstants.Exercise
      This interface defines exercise data of user.
      static interface  HealthConstants.FoodInfo
      This interface defines food info that indicates HealthConstants.FoodIntake's nutritional information.
      static interface  HealthConstants.FoodIntake
      This interface defines food intake data of user.
      static interface  HealthConstants.HbA1c
      This interface defines glycated hemoglobin data of user.
      static interface  HealthConstants.HeartRate
      This interface defines heart rate data of user.
      static interface  HealthConstants.OxygenSaturation
      This interface defines oxygen saturation data in user's blood.
      static interface  HealthConstants.SessionMeasurement
      This interface contains measurement constants that has a session with the end time.
      static interface  HealthConstants.Sleep
      This interface defines sleep data of user.
      static interface  HealthConstants.SleepStage
      This interface defines the detailed sleep stage for the specified sleep data.
      static interface  HealthConstants.StepCount
      This interface defines user's step count data that S Health detects in real time on the local device.
      static interface  HealthConstants.UvExposure
      This interface defines UV exposure data around the device.
      static interface  HealthConstants.WaterIntake
      This interface defines water intake data of user.
      static interface  HealthConstants.Weight
      This interface defines weight data of user.

    • Field Detail

      • USER_PROFILE_DATA_TYPE

        public static final String USER_PROFILE_DATA_TYPE
        Data type name for user profile.
        Use "com.samsung.health.user_profile" to add permission to the manifest file.

        User profile is available to read only and can be retrieved with HealthUserProfile.
